text:
="preserve">Kim Chang-sop (; 2 January 1946 – 9 June 2020) was a North Korean politician. He was a member of the Workers' Party of Korea. He was born in Unsan County, South Pyongan Province. He was the Vice Minister of the State Security Department from 2015 until his death.
Kim died on 9 June 2020 in Pyongyang at the age of 74.
